heading: HR01792
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS TO INVESTIGATE IN AID OF LEGISLATION AND OTHER PURPOSES, THE UNDESIRABLE, OBJECTIONABLE, AND NEFARIOUS PRACTICES OF CONTRACTORS OF GOVERNMENT PROJECTS IMPLEMENTED BY THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS, WHICH INCLUDE AMONG OTHERS, ABANDONMENT OF PROJECTS, NEGATIVE SLIPPAGE, USAGE OF SUBSTANDARD CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS, AND PROFFERING UNREASONABLY LOW BIDS ("BID DIVING"), BORROWING/RENTING OF LICENSE OF ONE CONTRACTOR FROM ANOTHER CONTRACTOR, TO COMPEL THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS TO IMMEDIATELY PROMULGATE ADDITIONAL PRE-QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS TO AVOID, ARREST, AND CURB THE ABOVE-MENTIONED IMPROPRIETIES AND MALPRACTICES TO THE PREJUDICE, DISADVANTAGE, AND DETRIMENT OF GOVERNMENT PROJECTS
principal-authors: CASTRO, FRANCE L.; GARCIA, GWENDOLYN F.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-05-16
